title: Finger Food: Bite-Sized Snacks to Share with Friends
description: Finger food is fun food. Shake off the conventions of cutlery and invite your friends to mingle, with a drink in one hand and a delicious morsel in the other. You'll discover how easy it can be to feed a crowd, whether it's a casual impromptu gathering or the most gorgeous of cocktail soirees.
author: Kay Scarlett
